Fre CANDIDATE 		Janny Smegen

Languages
Dutch: Mother tongue
English: Fluent
German: Fluent
French: Basic
CAREER SUMMARY
Jan 2021 to date Corbion – Purac-Biochem
Position: Sr. Key Account Manager EMEA – Lactic Acid & Specialties
Corbion is the global market leader in lactic acid and its derivatives, and a leading supplier of emulsifiers, functional enzyme blends, minerals, vitamins and algae ingredients.
Managing global, regional and national Pharma accounts
Build, nurture and grow relationships with existing and future (key) customers in close collaboration with a multidisciplinary team.
Provide a no-hassle buying experience to customers by actively anticipating on any (unspoken) quality and regulatory needs they may have and eliminating any hurdles.
Realize Sales and Added value Budget for assigned accounts
Take ownership of realization of business targets (revenues, volumes, prices, margins) of customers.
Drive growth of project pipeline and execution/progress on active projects.
Develop and execute on tactical year planning for assigned accounts.
Negotiate contracts with support of internal functions.
Collaborate with demand planning to implement accurate forecasting.
Implement sales & market strategies and plans to realize the business objectives.
Identify sustainable market opportunities and Work with other disciplines to convert into projects.
Collaborate with customer service to manage customer interface.
Execute on pricing strategies for the assigned accounts.
Gather/analyze competitive information to further refine sales growth.
Support product launches/withdrawals of products & applications.
Maintain records of all key activities in the CRM system.
Sept 2017 to Dec 2020 Evonik
Position: Key Account Manager & Sr. Business Manager EMEA – Oral Care
Evonik is one of the world leaders in specialty chemicals. It is the only company to provide both precipitated and fumed Silica.
Overall end-responsibility Silica in Oral Care in EMEA
Global Key Account Manager for a multinational account
See further duties at Huber Engineered Materials (below)
Jan 2004 to Sept 2017 HUBER Engineered Materials – Silica
Huber Engineered Materials (HEM) is a division of the J.M. Huber Corporation, one of the largest family-owned companies in the USA. HEM transforms engineered minerals and specialty chemicals into improved consumer/industrial products. Within the BU Silica. Silica(te)s were designed e.g. to improve the cleaning power of toothpaste, the brightness of paper and the strength of rubber. The Silica BU was sold to EVONIK in September 2017.
Jan 2007 to Sept 2017
Position: Global Key Account Manager Oral Care
Additional responsibility to lead and coordinate the global team for a Global Key Account; negotiate sales of Huber dental silicas.
Jan 2004 to Jan 2007
Position: Key Account Manager Oral Care Europe
Maintain and develop sales of Huber products to existing and new customers in the Oral Care Industry.
Direct Sales responsibility for European National and Multinational Key Accounts
Provide (technical) sales support to existing global key accounts, national accounts, prospects and distributor network in Europe.
Responsible for the growth of sales volume and gross margin for HEM products in Europe ensuring a maximum selling price.
Maintain a close understanding of the European market situation, competition, trends; ensure required market development is achieved
Work closely together with the Technical Support Function, R&D, the Dental Lab

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
